comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This photo appears to have been taken inside Steeplechase Park's "Pavillion of Fun." Here is a link to a map of Steeplechase Park's layout. i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb45/coney112006/stepla.jpg Today, the site (on the south side of Surf Ave., between W. 16th and W. 19th St.) is now occupied by MCU Park (formerly KeySpan Park). MCU Park is the home of the Brooklyn Cyclones, the New York Mets' minor league New York Penn League A-ball baseball team. This all would very roughly place the location of this photo in the stands on 3rd-base side of the ballpark (40.574750110296165, -73.98427248001098). Here's a link to a location on Google Maps: maps.google.com/maps?q=(40.574750110296165,+-73.984272480...

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On June 22, 2011, TVL1970 suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!
